Articles.Content:
This is just a bit of a thread for a few bugs or issues I've found with the game, if you have fixes feel free to post them

  • If craft main control body is destroyed on re-entry the game cannot be paused or exited through any means other than Task Manager
  • Small radial fuel tanks do not have radial crossfeed MRS issue
  • Heatshield fell off (Though unsure f this is lateral stresses)
  • When docking, the ship will spin out of control (Whilst using SAS to align to Target+ when Target is another docking port)
  • Large ships will bounce and destroy launchpad on flight revert
  • Maneuver Nodes infinitely increase dV required to execute them as you rotate around an axis to point towards them

That's all so far, I'll post more as they arise
